name: Daffodil Software
overview:
Daffodil Software is a leading IT service provider from India. We provide full-cycle services including product engineering, customization, integration and implementation. Web based solutions have always been a fascination for us and we constantly look out for new technologies which makes the web solutions even more powerful and interesting.

Daffodil has proven its experience by delivering its services to more than 100 clients spread across 20 countries in different parts of the world. Our customers are companies of all sizes ranging from startups to large enterprises who realize that they need a professional solution to generate revenue streams, establish communication channels or streamline business operations.

Daffodil started as a product company in 1999 and its product suite includes Daffodil DB- A Java RDBMS and Daffodil Replicator - A Data Synchronization Tool for relational databases. Daffodil has a very ambitious roadmap for its product division with few potentially game changing products in making.

offices.address1: Daffodil Software Ltd. 2nd Floor, Vipul Plaza
